name: Discount Rules, Coupon management system ‚Äì Discountify
author: Woooplugin

sections.description:
Discountify is a WooCommerce discount rules and dynamic pricing plugin that allow you to set different discount rules in WordPress eCommerce store.

Discountify WooCommerce discount rules and dynamic pricing plugin is a powerful tool designed to enhance the functionality of your WooCommerce store. It provide advanced discounting and pricing capabilities. This plugin is instrumental in creating a dynamic and personalized shopping experience for your customers. It helps you maximize your sales and revenue.

By leveraging the WooCommerce discount rules and dynamic pricing plugin, online store owners can enhance customer satisfaction, boost sales, and stay competitive in the dynamic eCommerce landscape. The flexibility and customization options provided by this plugin make it an indispensable tool for creating compelling promotions and pricing structures.

Helpful links üëá

‚≠êÔ∏è Check premium Features üëâ Discountify Pro
‚≠êÔ∏è Need Any Help? üëâ Contact Us.
‚≠êÔ∏è Check Live Demo üëâ Discountify Demo

Use of Discountify Plugin

  • Set Discount Rules
  • Fixed Discounts
  • Percentage Discounts
  • Discount on total Cart
  • Buy X Get X – Pro
  • Buy X Get Y – Pro
  • Buy 1 Get 1 Free – Pro
  • Free Product or Gift – Pro
  • Conditional Discounts – Pro
  • Buy 2 Get 1 at 50% OFF – Pro
  • Buy From Category A get Discount from Category B – Pro
  • Discount on Total Spend – Pro
  • Customer Specific Pricing – Pro
  • Bulk Pricing – Pro
  • Dynamic Pricing – Pro

Current Feature

Discount Rules, Dynamic Pricing for WooCommerce ‚Äì Discountify! With its easy-to-use interface , comprehensive features, lightweight, yet powerful plugin to attract customers, boost conversions and increase Revenue.

üëâ Buy X Get X discount – Buy X Get X discount is a promotion offered in a WooCommerce store where customers receive a discount or free product after purchasing a specified quantity of the same product.
üëâ Buy X Get Y discount – Buy X Get Y discount rule refers to a promotion where customers who purchase a specific product (X) are eligible for a discount on another product (Y).
üëâ Free Product or Gift – Free gift promotion plays an essential role on boosting your sale in different ways. Promotional gifts are the most effective way for encouraging new customers to purchase products over and over from your online store.
üëâ Conditional Discounts – Conditional discounts are a clever pricing strategy where discounts or special offers are granted to a purchase based on specific conditions or criteria being satisfied.
üëâ Category Combination – Category combination condition refers to the process of combining different categories for a discount using specific rules or conditions. Like customer who purchase a shirt is eligible for discount a sunglass.
üëâ Fixed Discounts – This feature is designed to help you incentivize customers to purchase more while maintaining a higher profit margin.
üëâ Percentage discounts – It will Replace ‚ÄúSale‚Äù badge on every sales product with percentage of discount.
üëâ Discount on Total Spend – Discount based on the total amount spent by the customer.Discount based on the total number of orders placed by the customer.
üëâ Customer Specific Pricing – Discountify is a useful plugin for anyone looking to increase or discount prices for individual customers and user roles.
üëâ Free Shipping based on Cart Amount/Quantity – Offer free Shipping based on cart amount.
üëâ Bulk Pricing – Bulk discounts helps to clear stock of your sales by offering customer. For example, a retailer may offer a bulk discount of 10% for purchasing 10 or more of a product.
üëâ Dynamic Pricing – It allows to set up promotions, dynamic price for your WooCommerce store with clean.
üëâ Discount on total Cart – Add Cart Discount based on cart total amount.
üëâ Shipping Cost based On cart total or amount – Offer exclusive discount based cart total amount / quantity on shipping
üëâ Discount on First Order – Offer discount on 1st purchase
üëâ Discount based on purchase history – Discount Based on previous purchase history

üìå [Before writing any review, Please be aware that, Discountify is still in its initial stage]

More features are on the way! You can see the Changelog for more update. Join us on social media to get the latest update and offers.

üî• WHAT‚ÄôS NEXT

If you like Discountify, then consider checking out other WordPress Plugins made by the same team:

üîî Ultimate Membership ‚Äì Create Members for WordPress and WooCommerce and Boost your sales
üîî Filter Plus ‚Äì It is a WordPress and WooCommerce Product Filter Plugin that allows users to add multiple filtering features like filter by Ratings, Tags, Price Range, Custom Fields etc.
üîî Quicker ‚Äì Convert Your Browsers into Buyers and Maximize Conversions
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/discountify directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. All Settings will be found in Admin Wooplugins -> Discountify
sections.faq:
Is it compatible with all WordPress themes?

We have tested all the popular themes. And we believe, it will work with your theme if that has been well developed for WordPress and WooComerce. If you face any issue, drop us a message on our support link. Our team will take care of the compatibility issue.
